about_the_game:
Introducing "The Adventures of TED and the Lost Magic Crystals," a 2.5D platformer adventure game. Join Young TED on his quest to find the lost magic crystals, essential for the survival of the squirrel kingdom. Although TED's motivation is driven by the promise of a reward rather than heroism, the journey is not without its challenges.

Features:
- 31 levels to conquer
- Epic battles against giant bosses
- Engaging cinematic and action sequences
- Hidden items and secrets to discover and collect
- Unlockable in-game achievements
- Compatible with Xbox & Playstation controllers


This classic 2.5D platformer adventure game from RgamesID promises a nostalgic experience with its 3D low poly graphics, reminiscent of the golden era of console gaming.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 550/equivalent or higher
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: High-range Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760/equivalent or higher
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: The Adventures of TED and the Lost Magic Crystals is a 2.5D platformer adventure from RgamesID. Ted is on a quest to find the lost magic crystals, which are the source of life for the squirrel's kingdom.
